amendment.description: To provide for additional means of certifying children, youth, parents, and families as homeless.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2087 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2087 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 2089.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2087 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
